---
title: "R Primers for TCSM"
toc: false
---

A version of the old RStudio/Posit Primers, ported to Quarto and webR by
[Andrew Heiss](https://www.andrewheiss.com/) and adjusted to suit the needs of
[*Theory Construction and Statistical Modeling*](https://kylemlang.com/tcsm) by
[Kyle M. Lang](https://kylemlang.com).
